Libaray Reference¶

GeneticAlgorithm¶

In Class Struct

struct GeneticAlgorithm::GaStruct¶

Struct for a unit in the population.

Public Members

PopulationPropertiesType populationProperties¶

Properties (Parameter Space) for a unit in the population

double fitness¶

Fitness value. Store the fitness of a unit in the population

template <class PopulationPropertiesType>
class GeneticAlgorithm¶

Main Class for Genetic Algorithm.

It has a population group which is easy to initialize. We also make it easy to do crossover and mutation in the population group.

Genetic Algorithm is a class template. You can create the class accroding to different kind of properties type of the unit in the population.

Templates
  • PopulationPropertiesType -

    the type of populationProperties.

Public Functions

GeneticAlgorithm(PopulationPropertiesType population_properties, unsigned int population_number)¶

Constructor for GeneticAlgorithm class.

Example:

The following is used to create a geneticAlgoritm object with a populationProperties of vector<double> type and the number of units in the whole population is 1000. 

#include <vector>
using namespace std;
vector<double> populationProperties (10, 0.0);
int populationNumber = 1000;
GeneticAlgoritm<vector<double>> geneticAlgoritm(populationProperties, populationNumber);

Parameters
  • population_properties -

    Properties (Parameter Space) for a unit in the population.

  • population_number -

    Number of units in the whole population.

void initPopulation(double rand_min, double rand_max, double rand_base)¶

Initialize the population group.

Every Properties for the unit in the population group will initialize with a random number. The random number will generate in the following way: 

double fraction = (double)(rand() % int(rand_base) / rand_base);
double randomNumber = rand_min + fraction * (rand_max - rand_min);

Parameters
  • rand_min -

    Random number lower bound.

  • rand_max -

    Random number upper bound.

  • rand_base -

    Random number generation base.

void sortByFitness()¶

Sort the population by the fitness of the unit from low to high.

void mate(double elitrate, double mutationrate)¶

Generate next generation of population by mutation and crossover.

Parameters
  • elitrate -

    elitism rate of the Genetic Algorithm. Elitism unit is the unit directly transfer to the next generation without mutation and crossover.

  • mutationrate -

    Rate for the Mutation.

Public Members

GaVector *populationP¶

Population Pointer.

A GaVector pointer point to the population member.

GaVector is actually an alias that define by typedef to replace vector<GaStruct>. 

typedef vector<GaStruct> GaVector;

GaVector *bufferP¶

Buffer Pointer.

A GaVector pointer pouint to the buffer member. Buffer with GaVector type serve as a temporary buffer layer to store population.
